modmenu.summaryTranslation.colorful_hex: Makes HEX color tags in chat useful.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.colorful_:
Makes HEX color tags in chat useful.
You can see what color is represented by HEX code and copy it to clipboard in one click.
[WORKS ON CLIENT-SIDE ONLY]
colorful_hex.click_to_copy: Click to copy this color code!
